title: One World Observatory
seo_title: One World Observatory | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: One of the coolest experiences in all of New York City, the One World Observatory offers 360-degree views of the metropolis in all its splendor.
description: One of the coolest experiences in all of New York City, the One World Observatory offers 360-degree views of the metropolis in all its splendor. Jet to the top of the tallest building in the Western Hemisphere in less than 60 seconds before walking out over the busy city in the observatory’s Sky Portal, a 14-foot, clear glass disc, 100 stories above the city below. Here you can see forever - and The Frederick can arrange it. Our One World Observatory package includes tickets for two and overnight accommodations at our Tribeca boutique hotel, just a few blocks away.
